availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Drury Drew Overby (Hopkins/ Webster County, Ky, farmer )

body.p: Hopkins County and Webster County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Lucinda Overby. Father of William Overby, Sarah Overby, John Overby, Richard Overby, Charles Overby, James Overby, Albert Overby, Mary Overby, and Wallace Overby. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1850. Farmer in Webster County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 136A-B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, District 4, p. 232A.
Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866 NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 02, Webster County, Kentucky, 1864, p. 29.
"Drury Drew Overby (1818-1883)," Find A Grave, Memorial #43034713, accessed December 14, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/43034713.
